timeline.bodyText: Does not look like a common scenario, but always dangerous with things that need to be added multiple places. I get that we could do additional testing on non-published builds, but wouldn't it most often follow each other. Further, could maybe be filtered on generic branch naming conventions, e.g. ['master', 'next-major', 'ojo/'] if not ruining other CI/branching naming conventions.
timeline.author: rorbech

replies.bodyText:
Good point. We should probably extract this list into a shared one.
Generally, we only rigorously test master and next-major. Releasing from v10 should probably be considered a hack we will revert once we can merge the branch to next-major
replies.author: cmelchior
